div.div:
Officially Licensed
Made By Reebok
This high-quality
Men's Reebok Premier Brett Favre Minnesota Vikings Purple Jersey: NFL Throwback #4 Home Team 50th Patch
by Reebok NFL Equipment features tackle twill numbers and nameplate, a screened team wordmark on the front and Reebok logos on the sleeves for an official game day look! Mesh body with dazzle sleeves, shoulders & sides, Tackle twill numbers & lettering, Rib-knit v-neck collar, Embroidered NFL Equipment logo at the neck, Jock tag, Drop tail, Side slits at hem, Imported, 100% Polyester, Officially licensed NFL product.

div.p: When purchasing NFL jerseys, it's important to know exactly what type you're looking for. Jerseys are split into 3 categories to meet the needs of all types of fans. If you're just looking for a recreational jersey to show your team pride, then the Replica model may be your best choice. For a slightly heavier and more durable design, you can choose from the Premier line. If you want the same look and high-quality as the jerseys worn by the players on the field, then an Authentic jersey is for you! Each type of jersey shows you're a true fan and the chart below is designed to help you choose the one that's best for you.

tr.td: Replica jerseys feature the same patterns as the Authentic jerseys but are crafted with thinner fabric and screen-printed graphics. These jerseys are designed for budget-minded fans who want the look of a real player's jersey.
Premier jerseys are made with slightly heavier fabric than Replica jerseys and have sewn-on numbers and names. These jerseys fall in-between the on-field Authentic jerseys and the Replica jerseys.

Authentic jerseys are crafted just like the ones on the field. They feature heavier fabric with all sewn-on graphics matching those worn by the actual players. These jerseys are designed for fans seeking the same high quality as worn by their favorite players.
Slightly thicker fabric than Replica jerseys
Diamondback Mesh body; nylon for colors and polyester for white
Polyester Premier Mesh body; newly developed diagonal-pattern 2-tone flat tricot mesh
Pro-Brite, Diamondback or stretchaire nylon or polyester mesh
Dazzle sleeves/yoke; nylon for colors and polyester for white
Polyester Premier Dazzle sleeve/yoke; dull dazzle fabric
Metallic Plus nylon or polyester dazzle. Duratalic Cordura® nylon/Lycra® spandex or polyester/Lycra® spandex
Polyester engineered stripe knit inserts for select teams
Polyester engineered stripe knit inserts for select teams
Polyester engineered stripe rib knit collars and cuffs specific to the teams
Screen-printed single-layer tackle twill on a sewn-down name plate
Sewn-on tackle twill on a sewn-down nameplate
If applicable, duplicated either as a set-in stripe, screenprint, or knit-in jacquard, depending on the game jersey
If applicable, duplicated either as a set-in stripe, screenprint, or knit-in jacquard, depending on the game jersey
If applicable, duplicated either as a set-in stripe, screenprint, or knit-in jacquard, depending on the game jersey
Official NFL® Equipment Patch sewn on to the bottom of the front collar or fabric insert
Official NFL® Equipment Patch sewn onto the team-colored neckline
Official NFL® Equipment Patch sewn on to the bottom of the front collar or fabric insert
Reebok® vector screen-printed on each sleeve
Reebok® vector screen-printed on each sleeve

Reebok®-NFL® jocktag with alpha sizing applied to the lower left bottom of the jersey
